name: Euchre by Webfoot
description:
Play the classic trick-taking card game Euchre on your iPad, iPhone and iPod.

Compete against the computer's AI players for a real challenge. This Euchre game is played with a deck of 32 cards. Four players play in pairs, one human player and 3 computer players. Game play is fast paced.

Enjoy a soothing soundtrack and smooth animated gameplay. Includes detailed in-game rules and help. Classic card game fun for all ages!

This game is best played on tablet devices.

Features:

* Real Euchre rules
* Play against the computer AI
* Fast animated play
* Detailed game rules included
* Soothing soundtrack

Compatibility:

* iPhone
* iPod Touch
* iPad
